* BrightBlade looked around the vast plain as she neared the Cybertronien 
Fire, noticing that most base defences were online but knowing that she 
would be able to get past the ones that she needed to.
With a slight snicker she trotted up to the perimeter where the shields 
would be located, not sure if she would be able to see them or not.
From this point on she would need to be quicker then she had ever been 
before.
BrightBlade looked at the massive ship as she silently transformed, the 
cloaking device masking her energy signature just as she had programmed it 
to.
She removed a second cloaking device from her leg compartment, this one 
programmed to cloaking the cloaking signature that her first cloaking field 
gave off. Also, to make sure that she would be able to pass through the wall 
of energy that made up the Maximal shield.
Attaching the second cloaking device right beside the first she activated it 
and began to move towards the ship again.
As she approached one of the massive walls of the Cybertronien Fire she 
happened to glance to the right and notice two Maximals heading towards the 
base, simply shrugging and going back to locating a vent opening in the 
wall.
BrightBlade smiled as she spotted a vent, only a foot or so from her 
position on the ground.
With a sigh she looked up at the opening before reaching up and simply 
pushing the grating in a bit.
With a quick eye she noticed that there were no Maximals about, the two she 
had spotted before out of view from her.
BrightBlade then heaved herself up into the shaft, the cover of the vent 
simply sliding back into it's last position.
She then looked down the vent, her eyes seeming easily into the dark.
Now it was time to find a computer console that would be able to give her 
the information she needed.*
